property.property_name: 3 BHK Apartment for rent in Purva Atria Platina, Raj Mahal Vilas Stage 2
property.property_description: This is Brand New Apartment with Semi Furnished Vitrified & wooden flooring, Modular Kitchen, All rooms wardrobes fixed, latest fittings & fixtures ready to occupy. Comes with a covered car park and a two wheeler parking.
